{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15977v1", "title": "QCaMP: A 4-Week Summer Camp Introducing High School Students to Quantum
  Information Science and Technology", "summary": "The 2024 Quantum Computing, Math and Physics Camp (QCaMP) for Students was a
4-week long summer camp aimed at introducing high school students to quantum
concepts and careers, including applications spanning quantum computing,
sensing, and communication. The program ran for 7 hours/day, Monday-Friday,
July 1-26, and included hands-on modules and activities, professional
development, and project-based learning. Here we provide details on the camp
curriculum and outcomes based on pre and post knowledge and attitudes
assessments.", "main_category": "physics.ed-ph", "categories": "physics.ed-ph,quant-ph", "published": "2025-04-22T15:25:51Z"}
